00037 template<unsigned DIM>
00038 class AbstractTwoBodyInteractionForce : public AbstractForce<DIM>
00039 {
00040 private:
00041 
00043     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00050     template<class Archive>
00051     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00052     {
00053         // If Archive is an output archive, then '&' resolves to '<<'
00054         // If Archive is an input archive, then '&' resolves to '>>'
00055         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractForce<DIM> >(*this);
00056         archive & mUseCutOffLength;
00057         archive & mMechanicsCutOffLength;
00058     }
00059 
00060 protected:
00061 
00063     bool mUseCutOffLength;
00064 
00066     double mMechanicsCutOffLength;
00067 
00068 public:
00069 
00073     AbstractTwoBodyInteractionForce();
00074 
00080     bool GetUseCutOffLength();
00081 
00088     void SetCutOffLength(double cutOffLength);
00089 
00095     double GetCutOffLength();
00096 
00108     virtual c_vector<double, DIM> CalculateForceBetweenNodes(unsigned nodeAGlobalIndex, unsigned nodeBGlobalIndex, AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation)=0;
00109 
00116     void AddForceContribution(std::vector<c_vector<double, DIM> >& rForces,
00117                               AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation);
00118 
00124     virtual void OutputForceParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00125 };
